website_summaries.verdict: The FlexyPaw lets you clip a toy or snack to the top of your phone AND features a flexible neck.
pros: Attach your dog's favorite snack or toy – up to one-half inch thick – to the top of your phone
Works with front or rear-facing cameras
Compatible with most smartphones, smartphone cases and tablets
Can use for many different kinds of pets
cons: May not work with waterproof cases or battery pack cases

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ with treat loving dogs
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. Some dogs refuse to look at you the second you point a camera in their direction. With this device you won’t ever have that problem again. Unless your dog hates treats. And then (I would assume) you have got bigger issues than pictures. It might be time to ditch the camera and seek professional help for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeniebean

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter what I put on the clip, my pupbabies are interested! Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Rogers

customer_reviews.title: My Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Now my pup looks at me (or the phone/camera) whenever I'm using the FlexyPaw. If I don't have the FlexyPaw on my phone - she won't even think about letting me take her picture!
customer_reviews.author: Judith W.

customer_reviews.title: Pawfect for making memories!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it got my dogs full attention! Treats stayed on nicely. Will be ordering more to give away for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kaia’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister in law. Works great. Such a cute gift. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett White

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Molded plastic weak clip barely holds anything .... Bought on a whim... My fault
customer_reviews.author: The great Odysseus

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT pet friendly product. Keeps my pup still and attentive for a quality pic when I put his favorite toy or treat clipped on. I can’t be happier with what I purchased! Highly recommend to all dog lovers who want to snap that perfect pic!
customer_reviews.author: adam rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well this works.... love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool product~~~me and my pet enjoyed so much and have life time memory...thanks to FlexyPow~~~
customer_reviews.author: Taeho Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 5 minutes Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hook well on cellphones. Broke in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Peter Davidson

customer_reviews.title: $24? Overpiced. Treat clip is really stiff and ...
customer_reviews.text: $24? Overpiced. Treat clip is really stiff and does not open very wide. Slips off my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dog is so hard to photograph but this changed that script it’s adorable and I have gotten so many good pictures
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment for my pets while taking pictures.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very well made. Easy to clip on my phone. My dogs love it. Taking pictures of them made my life more easier. Good product. Will buy it again and recommend to any animal lovers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Yang

customer_reviews.title: Easy product to use with great results!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Works great for dogs, cats, and other small animals!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Trinh

product_meta.title: FlexyPaw The Best Way to Take Selfies or Portraits of Your Dog
feature_bullets: EASIEST way to take SELFIES or PORTRAITS of your pet.
CLIP on your pet's favorite treat or toy to grab their attention. The Flexy Paw can hold treats or toys up to 1/2" thick.
FLEXIBLE neck allows you to adjust to any angle, utilizing the front and rear facing camera.
COMPATIBLE with iPhone, Android, along with most smart phones, and tablets.
SLIDES onto most thick cases used in today's market. 1/2" thick cases without any issues.
